results.title: Clinical impact of metformin exposure during Staphylococcus aureus bacteremia in patients with diabetes mellitus.
results.journal: Eur J Clin Microbiol Infect Dis
results.text_hl: METHODS: A 3-year observational cohort study of 452 patients (aged >= 16 years) with @DISEASE_Staphylococcal_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D013203 @@@SAB@@@ was performed at a tertiary care hospital. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ exposure was defined as receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ during @DISEASE_Staphylococcal_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D013203 @@@SAB@@@, regardless of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use before the onset of @<m>DISEASE_Bacteremia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016470 @@@bacteremia@@@.

citations.NLM: Lee JY, Kim ES, Chang E, Bae S, Jung J, Kim MJ, Chong YP, Kim SH, Choi SH, Lee SO, Kim YS. Clinical impact of metformin exposure during Staphylococcus aureus bacteremia in patients with diabetes mellitus. Eur J Clin Microbiol Infect Dis. 2023 Oct 18;():. PMID: 37851178
citations.BibTeX: @article{37851178, title={Clinical impact of metformin exposure during Staphylococcus aureus bacteremia in patients with diabetes mellitus.}, author={Lee JY and Kim ES and Chang E and Bae S and Jung J and Kim MJ and Chong YP and Kim SH and Choi SH and Lee SO and Kim YS}, journal={Eur J Clin Microbiol Infect Dis}}

results.title: Metformin Affects Serum Lactate Levels in Predicting Mortality of Patients with Sepsis and Bacteremia
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Affects Serum @CHEMICAL_Lactic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019344 @@@Lactate@@@ Levels in Predicting Mortality of @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@Sepsis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Bacteremia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016470 @@@Bacteremia@@@

citations.NLM: Chen FC, Kung CT, Cheng HH, Cheng CY, Tsai TC, Hsiao SY, Wu CH, Su CM. Metformin Affects Serum Lactate Levels in Predicting Mortality of Patients with Sepsis and Bacteremia J Clin Med. 2019 Mar 6;8(3):. PMID: 30845747
citations.BibTeX: @article{30845747, title={Metformin Affects Serum Lactate Levels in Predicting Mortality of Patients with Sepsis and Bacteremia}, author={Chen FC and Kung CT and Cheng HH and Cheng CY and Tsai TC and Hsiao SY and Wu CH and Su CM}, journal={J Clin Med}, volume={8}, number={3}}
